Adventuring

Mission Setup

  1. Roll for Adventure Status
  2. Roll for day of the week
  3. Roll for time of day
  4. Days starts at 1
  5. Roll for starting moon phase
  6. Roll for season
  7. Roll for weather

Daily Setup

_after start of mission

  1. Day plus 1 after start
  2. Moon phase updated by 1
  3. Roll for weather

Random Tables

Date

1d8 Day of Week
1 Monday
2 Tuesday
3 Wednesday
4 Thursday
5 Friday
6 Saturday
7 Sunday
8 Rol again
1d4 Time of Day
1 Morning
2 Afternoon
3 Evening
4 Night/Late

Moon Phases

1d8 Phase
1 New Moon
2 Waning Cresent
3 Third Quarter
4 Waning Gibbous
5 Full Moon
6 Waxing Gibbous
7 First Quarter
8 Waxing Cresent

Roll 1d4 to get the day of the phase, there are ideally 3 days for each phase of the moon, if you roll a 4 reroll until you get 1-3.

Seasons

1d4 Season
1 Winter
2 Spring
3 Summer
4 Fall

Weather

Min Max Description
1 1 Unseasonably Cold
2 3 Chilly
4 7 Precipitation
8 13 Clear
14 17 Overcast
18 19 Warm
20 20 Unseasonably Hot
